summary: This test suite validates the behavior of CKAN's license model, checking that licenses are correctly registered, that default license entries contain expected attributes, and that both legacy (v1) and newer (v2) registration styles—including internationalized fields—function as intended. It also confirms that license information can be accessed via object attributes.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable handling of licensing information within the CKAN platform, supporting dataset compliance and proper presentation of license metadata across different registration formats and languages.
